results.content:
Really helpful info to get WCF Restful service working.  With GET and POST method one can quickly implement WCF service in their new or existing project without huge modification in their codebase.

But the tutorial lacks clear explanation in several concepts like 
1. Why/when to use DataContract and DataMember attributes in a class. 
2. Necessity of serialization/deserialization.
3. Failed to explain web config details that the author has written and also has not shown default values that gets added to web config file when SVC file is added.
4. Lack of exception handling both in client side and server side.
results.content_html:
Really helpful info to get WCF Restful service working. With GET and POST method one can quickly implement WCF service in their new or existing project without huge modification in their codebase.

But the tutorial lacks clear explanation in several concepts like
1. Why/when to use DataContract and DataMember attributes in a class.
2. Necessity of serialization/deserialization.
3. Failed to explain web config details that the author has written and also has not shown default values that gets added to web config file when SVC file is added.
4. Lack of exception handling both in client side and server side.
